full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A RA'I ZHABS KYIS MDZAD PA'I 'BUM BSANGS BEE d'URYA SNGON PO BKRA SHIS 'DOD PA'I RE BSKONGS MA BZHUGS SO, ,
